verses.verse: A Song <WH7892> or Psalm <WH4210> of David <WH1732>. O 'Elohim <WH430>, my heart <WH3820> is fixed <WH3559> <WH8737>; I will sing <WH7891> <WH8799> and give praise <WH2167> <WH8762>, even with my glory <WH3519>.
Awake <WH5782> <WH8798>, psaltery <WH5035> and harp <WH3658>: I myself will awake <WH5782> <WH8686> early <WH7837>.
I will praise <WH3034> <WH8686> thee, O YY <WH3068>, among the people <WH5971>: and I will sing praises <WH2167> <WH8762> unto thee among the nations <WH3816>.
For thy mercy <WH2617> is great <WH1419> above the heavens <WH8064>: and thy truth <WH571> reacheth unto the clouds <WH7834>.
Be thou exalted <WH7311> <WH8798>, O 'Elohim <WH430>, above the heavens <WH8064>: and thy glory <WH3519> above all the earth <WH776>;
That thy beloved <WH3039> may be delivered <WH2502> <WH8735>: save <WH3467> <WH8685> with thy right hand <WH3225>, and answer <WH6030> <WH8798> me.

'Elohim <WH430> hath spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> in his holiness <WH6944>; I will rejoice <WH5937> <WH8799>, I will divide <WH2505> <WH8762> SH'khem <WH7927>, and mete out <WH4058> <WH8762> the valley <WH6010> of Sukkot <WH5523>.
Gil`ad <WH1568> is mine; M'nasheh <WH4519> is mine; Efrayim <WH669> also is the strength <WH4581> of mine head <WH7218>; Y'hudah <WH3063> is my Torahgiver <WH2710> <WH8781>;
Moab <WH4124> is my washpot <WH7366> <WH5518>; over Edom <WH123> will I cast out <WH7993> <WH8686> my shoe <WH5275>; over Philistia <WH6429> will I triumph <WH7321> <WH8709>.
Who will bring <WH2986> <WH8686> me into the strong <WH4013> city <WH5892>? who will lead <WH5148> <WH8804> me into Edom <WH123> ?
Wilt not thou, O 'Elohim <WH430>, who hast cast us off <WH2186> <WH8804>? and wilt not thou, O 'Elohim <WH430>, go forth <WH3318> <WH8799> with our hosts <WH6635> ?
Give <WH3051> <WH8798> us help <WH5833> from trouble <WH6862>: for vain <WH7723> is the help <WH8668> of man <WH120>.
Through 'Elohim <WH430> we shall do <WH6213> <WH8799> valiantly <WH2428>: for he it is that shall tread down <WH947> <WH8799> our enemies <WH6862>.
